To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Minimum _min;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_min = MIN(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_min.IsReady)
{
    var periodsSinceMinimum = _min.PeriodsSinceMinimum.Value;
    var period = _min.Period.Value;
    var current = _min.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.min = self.MIN(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.min.IsReady:
    periods_since_minimum = self.min.PeriodsSinceMinimum.Value
    period = self.min.Period.Value
    current = self.min.Current.Value
